alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 1:17AM AKST until November 30 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...PASSING FRONT BRINGING SNOW TO NORTHERN LYNN CANAL... .An incoming front will continue bringing moisture to the northern panhandle through Thursday morning. As of 11 PM Wednesday night, Haines Airport began reporting snowfall. Just after midnight, highway webcam near Klehini Bridge at MP 36 on the Haines Highway showed an estimated 1 - 3 inches had already fallen. For the highway and higher elevations near Haines, heavy snow totals up to 6 inches are still expected. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
